mapper.insert: insert into tbl_information (i_id, i_title, i_time, i_content, eid, i_infotype) values (#{iId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{iTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{iContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{iInfotype,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update tbl_information set i_title = #{iTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, i_time = #{iTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, i_content = #{iContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eid = #{eid,jdbcType=CHAR}, i_infotype = #{iInfotype,jdbcType=CHAR} where i_id = #{iId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select i_id, i_title, i_time, i_content, eid, i_infotype from tbl_information
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_information(i_id, i_title, i_time, i_content, eid, i_infotype) VALUES(#{iId},#{iTitle},#{iTime},#{iContent},#{eid},#{iInfotype})
mapper.select: SELECT i.i_id, i.i_title, i.i_time, i.i_content, e.e_user_name eid, d.value i_infotype FROM tbl_information i JOIN tbl_dic_value d ON d.id=i.i_infotype JOIN tbl_employee e ON e.eid=i.eid WHERE i.i_id=#{id}
